text: [Yuusufu] fuɗɗori doŋle maɓɓe ɗen ado doŋngal neene-gooto makko on; refti o yaltiniri nde ka doŋngal neene-gooto makko on. Ko wano non men fewjirani Yuusufa, [tawde] o hattantaano nanngude neene-gooto makko on ka sariya laamɗo on, si wanaa hara ko Alla muuyi. Meɗen ɓantana darajaaji on mo Men muuyi. No e dow kala jom-ganndal ganndo [goo]
